AudioEngineNotInitializedError: Audio engine wasn't initialized, haptic feedback not available
ControllerEmuAppAsAdmin: Controller will be hidden only if HidHide Driver is installed
ControllerEmuUserMode: Application is not running as administrator, real controller will not be hidden from other apps durning controller emulation
DS4Shortcut: Right D-pad + Mic button = DS4 Emulation
DisconnectAllBTDevicesOnExit: Disconnect all bluetooth devices on application exit
DisconnectControllerShortcut: Touchpad + Mic button = Disconnect Bluetooth controller
FullyRetractWhenNoData: Fully retract the triggers when there is no incoming data
GyroToMouseShortcut: L1 + Mic button = Gyro to mouse
GyroToRightAnalogStickShortcut: L2 + Mic button = Gyro to right analog stick
HapticsUnavailable: Haptic Feedback features are unavailable in Bluetooth mode.
HapticsUnavailableNoAudioDevice: Couldn't find the DualSense Wireless Controller speaker associated with this controller. Haptic feedback not available
LED_DS4_Unavailable: LED settings are unavailable while emulating DualShock 4
LEDandATunavailableUDP: LED and Adaptive Trigger settings are unavailable while UDP is active
RunAudioToHapticsOnStart: Run audio to haptics on start
SetDefaultConfig: Set default config for this port
StopEmuShortcut: Down D-pad + Mic button = Stop emulation
SwapTriggersShortcut: Up D-pad + Mic button = Swap triggers in "Rumble To AT" option
Tooltip_AudioToLED: Sync the lightbar with audio levels
Tooltip_BatteryLightbar: Display Battery Status with color-coded LED indicators.
Tooltip_DS4Shortcut: Shortcut to start DS4 Controller Emulation
Tooltip_Dualshock4V2: Emulates the second revision of DualShock 4, older games will not recognise it
Tooltip_GyroToMouse: When holding L2, the mouse will move according to your controller's motions
Tooltip_GyroToRightAnalogStick: When holding L2, the right analog stick will move according to your controller's motions
Tooltip_HapticFeedback: Controls standard rumble values of your DualSense. This is what your controller does to emulate DualShock 4 rumble motors.
Tooltip_HapticsToTriggers: Turns haptic feedback signal to Adaptive Trigger effects, works only for games that don't write to the controller or Audio To Haptics feature
Tooltip_HideToTray: Hides window after minimizing; click tray icon to restore
Tooltip_MaxFrequency: Sets maximum trigger vibration frequency for Rumble To Adaptive Triggers option
Tooltip_MaxIntensity: Sets maximum trigger vibration sensitivity for Rumble To Adaptive Triggers option
Tooltip_MaxMotor: Sets maximum vibration for emulated controller
Tooltip_RealMicFunctionality: Mimics microphone button functionality from the PS5, only works on this controller's microphone.
Tooltip_RemoveDefaultConfig: Removes default configuration for this port
Tooltip_RumbleToAT: Translates rumble vibrations to adaptive triggers, really good in games that don't support them natively
Tooltip_RunAsAdmin: Runs the app as administrator on startup (requires restart)
Tooltip_SaveConfig: Saves current values to a file
Tooltip_SetDefaultConfig: Sets default config for this port. Auto-loads when the controller is connected.
Tooltip_SpeakerVolume: Sets speaker volume at hardware level, affects everything played on this controller
Tooltip_StartAudioToHaptics: Creates haptic feedback from your system audio.
Tooltip_StopWriting: This option will halt the communication between DualSenseY and your DualSense controller. Useful when you want to play a native DualSense game without closing this app.
Tooltip_SwapTriggersRumbleToAT: Sets left motor to right trigger and right motor to left trigger
Tooltip_SwapTriggersShortcut: Shortcut to toggle Swap Triggers in "Rumble To AT"
Tooltip_TakeScreenshot: Takes screenshot on mic button click. It's saved to your clipboard and your Pictures directory
Tooltip_TouchpadToHaptics: Makes the controller vibrate based on finger position
Tooltip_TouchpadToMouse: Use dualsense touchpad like a laptop touchpad
Tooltip_TriggersAsButtons: Sets trigger resistance to very hard and L2/R2 to maximum on slightest trigger pull
Tooltip_X360Shortcut: Shortcut to start X360 Controller Emulation
TouchpadAsRightStick: Use touchpad as right analog stick
TouchpadShortcut: Touchpad + Mic button = Touchpad as mouse
UseControllerActuatorsInsteadOfSystemAud: Use actuator audio peaks instead of system audio
UseControllerSpeakerInsteadOfSystemAudio: Use speaker audio peaks instead of system audio
X360Shortcut: Left D-pad + Mic button = X360 Controller Emulation
VigemMissing: Connection to ViGEm Client couldn't be made
VigemNotAvailablePlatform: ViGEm Client is not available on this platform
UnavailableInNonAdminMode: This feature is only available when running as administrator
